subject: Self Care
title: Reappraisal: Rewriting the Story
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Reappraisal: Rewriting the Story.

hook.text: She didn't reply to your text. You assume she's angry. Actually, her phone died. The story was yours, not hers.

buildup.text: Cognitive reappraisal means changing the interpretation of an event. The event stays; the meaning shifts.

discovery.text: Studies show reappraisal reduces negative emotion by up to 50% â€” more effectively than suppression ever does.

twist.text: Suppression hides the emotion but increases physiological stress. Reappraisal actually reduces it at the source.

climax.text: Next time you're upset, ask: what's another explanation? Generating alternatives loosens the emotional grip.

punchline.text: Change the story you tell. The emotion will follow.

quiz.question: How does reappraisal differ from suppression?
options: Reappraisal changes interpretation while suppression hides the emotion
